properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ny foko ry Mpamonjy !
Mangetaheta Anao,
Maniry lalandava
Hikambana aminao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Tsy afaka ao am-poko
Ny faniriana Anao,
Oneno re ny, foko,
Ho lapanao !

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ny androm-pahoriana,
Raha lapanao ny fo,
Manjary fitahiana
Izay manadio ny fo.
Tsy afaka ao, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ny ora fifaliana,
Raha ao anilanao,
Mamelom-paniriana
Hanao ny sitrakao.
Tsy afaka ao, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ho lao ny fahotako
Raha akaikezinao,
Tsy misy hadalako
Izay tsy afakao.
Tsy afaka ao, sns.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Finaritra ny saiko
raha ipetrahanao,
Fa reraka ny aiko
Raha halavirinao.
Tsy afaka ao, sns.
